methodDescription:
Adds a new Ad Campaign Creative to a specified Ad Campaign belonging to
the calling Affiliate.

params.name: campaign_id
params.description: The ID of the Ad Campaign to which the creative is being added.

params.name: data
params.description: An array of (field => value) containing the details of the new Ad Campaign Creative.

returnDescription: The ID of the newly-added Ad Campaign Creative.

methodDescription: Creates a new Ad Campaign for the Affiliate.

params.name: data
params.description: An array of (field => value) containing the details of the new Ad Campaign.

returnDescription: The ID of the newly-created Ad Campaign.

methodDescription: Find all Ad Campaign objects by filters.

params.name: filters
params.description: Field-level filters to restrict which Ad Campaigns are returned.

params.name: sort
params.description: Sort by fields and direction 'desc' or 'asc'.

params.name: limit
params.description: Limit the number of items returned per page.

params.name: page
params.description: Page by the limit of items returned. Defaults to page 1.

params.name: fields
params.description: Which fields to return on the matching Ad Campaigns.  If not specified, returns all fields.

params.name: contain
params.description: Related objects to return with the Ad Campaigns.

returnDescription: Matching Ad Campaign model objects.

methodDescription: Find all Ad Campaign Creatives by filters.

params.name: filters

returnDescription: Matching Ad Campaign Creative model objects.

methodDescription: Find an Ad Campaign by ID.

params.name: id
params.description: Ad Campaign ID.

params.name: fields
params.description: Which fields to return on the Ad Campaign.  If not specified, returns all fields.

params.name: contain
params.description: Related objects to return with the Ad Campaign.

returnDescription: Matching Ad Campaign or NULL if none with this ID found.

methodDescription:
Get Ad Campaign code. This is typically a brief snippet which is embedded
in the Affiliate's site.  It will load all the creatives / pixels / links
relevant to the ad campaign.

params.description: Ad Campaign ID.

params.name: params
params.description: Special params?

params.name: options
params.description: Special options?

returnDescription: Code for ad campaign.

params.name: page

methodDescription:
Update Ad Campaign with data properties by Ad Campaign ID. Data
properties is an associative array of fields to the values that they're
going to be updated to.

methodDescription: Update a given field for an Ad Campaign Creative.

params.description: The ID of the Ad Campaign Creative to update.

params.description: New Value to set for the specified field.

returnDescription: On successful update.

Returns a variety of details about an Affiliate User, including their
details, their Affiliate details, Account Manager details (if enabled),
and the relevant Brand Preferences.

methodDescription:
Get Conversion Stats with totals by filter, currency, data_start,
data_end and hour_offset for the calling Affiliate.

params.name: fields
params.description:
List of fields to display back in
                                        request.

params.name: groups
params.description: Group by certain fields.

params.name: filters
params.description:
Filter by fields and boolean
                                        operators.

params.name: sort
params.description:
Sort by fields and directions
                                        'desc' or 'asc'.

params.name: limit
params.description:
Limit the number of items
                                        returned per page.

params.name: page
params.description:
Page by the limit of times
                                        returned.
                                        Defaults to page 1.

params.name: totals
params.description: Get totals on aggregate fields.

params.name: data_start
params.description:
Start date range. Format YYYY-MM-DD.
                                        Note: this needs to be the same
                                        as the Stat.date filters and both
                                        need to be provided.

params.name: data_end
params.description:
End date range. Format YYYY-MM-DD.
                                        Note: this needs to be the same
                                        as the Stat.date filters and both
                                        need to be provided.

params.name: count
params.description: Do count for paging and limiting.

params.name: hour_offset
params.description: Timezone hour offset.

params.name: status_update_fields
params.description:
Update cached conversion results
                                        with conversion updated status.
                                        This is an associative array of
                                        conversion_id to the newly
                                        updated status. Example:
                                        [1234 => 'approved',
                                         1235 => 'rejected',
                                         ...].

returnDescription: Matching Stat model objects.

methodDescription: Get Affiliate Commission stats for the calling Affiliate.

params.name: fields
params.description: List of fields to display back in request.

params.name: groups
params.description: Group by certain fields.

params.name: filters
params.description: Filter by fields and boolean operators.

params.name: sort
params.description: Sort by fields and directions 'desc' or 'asc'.

params.name: limit
params.description: Limit the number of items returned per page.

params.name: page
params.description:
Page by the limit of times returned.
                                   Defaults to page 1.

params.name: totals
params.description: Get totals on aggregate fields.

params.name: internal
params.description: Bypass interface access filters.

returnDescription: Matching Stat model objects.

methodDescription:
Get Stats with totals by filters, currency, data_start, data_end
and hour_offset.

params.name: fields
params.description: List of fields to display back in request.

params.name: groups
params.description: Group by certain fields.

params.name: filters
params.description: Filter by fields and boolean operators.

params.name: sort
params.description: Sort by fields and directions 'desc' or 'asc'.

params.name: limit
params.description: Limit the number of items returned per page.

params.name: page
params.description:
Page by the limit of times returned.
                                   Defaults to page 1.

params.name: totals
params.description: Get totals on aggregate fields.

params.name: currency
params.description:
Default currency. Format ISO-4217.
                                   Example: 'USD', 'EUR', 'CNY'.

params.name: data_start
params.description:
Start date range. Format YYYY-MM-DD.
                                   Note: this needs to be the same as the
                                   Stat.date filters and both need to be
                                   provided.

params.name: data_end
params.description:
End date range. Format YYYY-MM-DD.
                                   Note: this needs to be the same as the
                                   Stat.date filters and both need to be
                                   provided.

params.name: count
params.description:
Do count for paging and limiting.
                                   Currently not used.

params.name: hour_offset
params.description: Timezone hour offset.

returnDescription: Matching Stat model objects.
